message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This is a special opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discount.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I recognize the value of the product. However, I'm working with a tighter budget. Would you consider $1,000,000?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of this, I am proposing a revised price of $1,100,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your financial planning while still ensuring a fair return for us.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be frank, $1,050,000 is the highest I can go.  I hope this works for you, as I believe this product would be a valuable asset.

I'm glad we're finding common ground here, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I propose we finalize the transaction at $1,075,000. This price reflects the value of the product while accommodating your budgetary considerations.
